languages.text: "Утверждение истинно. Сканирование показало полное отсутствие аномальных процессов. Остались лишь шрамы..." {n}Паскаль касается расколотой пластины респиратора. Голос его становится жестче:{/n} "Пустота будет заменена более чистым и благочестивым алгоритмом служения".

"This statement is true. A scan has shown a complete absence of anomalous processes. Only scars remain..." {n}Pasqal touches the cleft plate of his respirator. His voice becomes harsher.{/n} "The emptiness will be replaced with a purer and more pious algorithm of service."
languages.original_text: "Утверждение истинно. Сканирование показало полное отсутствие аномальных процессов. Остались лишь шрамы..." {n}Паскаль касается расколотой пластины респиратора. Голос его становится жестче:{/n} "Пустота будет заменена более чистым и благочестивым алгоритмом служения".

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这种说法是正确的。扫描结果显示，我身体中的异常过程已经彻底消失了，只剩下无数伤痕……”{n}帕斯卡摸着呼吸器的盖板，他的声音变得更加刺耳。{/n}“留下来的空洞，将被更加纯粹、更加虔诚的服务算法所取代。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. A scan has shown a complete absence of anomalous processes. Only scars remain..." {n}Pasqal touches the cleft plate of his respirator. His voice becomes harsher.{/n} "The emptiness will be replaced with a purer and more pious algorithm of service."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是正确的。扫描结果显示，我身体中的异常过程已经彻底消失了，只剩下无数伤痕……”{n}帕斯卡摸着呼吸器的盖板，他的声音变得更加刺耳。{/n}“留下来的空洞，将被更加纯粹、更加虔诚的服务算法所取代。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Esa declaración es cierta. El análisis refleja la total ausencia de procesos anómalos. Solo quedan cicatrices...». {n}Pasqal se toca la placa hendida del respirador. Su voz se endurece.{/n} «El vacío se llenará con un algoritmo de servicio más puro y pío».
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. A scan has shown a complete absence of anomalous processes. Only scars remain..." {n}Pasqal touches the cleft plate of his respirator. His voice becomes harsher.{/n} "The emptiness will be replaced with a purer and more pious algorithm of service."

traits.locale_text: «Esa declaración es cierta. El análisis refleja la total ausencia de procesos anómalos. Solo quedan cicatrices...». {n}Pasqal se toca la placa hendida del respirador. Su voz se endurece.{/n} «El vacío se llenará con un algoritmo de servicio más puro y pío».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「この言葉は真実だ。スキャンの結果、異常なプロセスの存在はまったく検出されなかった。傷跡だけが残っている…」{n}パスカルは呼吸器の桟に触れる。声が荒くなる。{/n}「空虚さは、より純粋で敬虔な奉仕のアルゴリズムに置き換えられるだろう」
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. A scan has shown a complete absence of anomalous processes. Only scars remain..." {n}Pasqal touches the cleft plate of his respirator. His voice becomes harsher.{/n} "The emptiness will be replaced with a purer and more pious algorithm of service."

traits.locale_text: 「この言葉は真実だ。スキャンの結果、異常なプロセスの存在はまったく検出されなかった。傷跡だけが残っている…」{n}パスカルは呼吸器の桟に触れる。声が荒くなる。{/n}「空虚さは、より純粋で敬虔な奉仕のアルゴリズムに置き換えられるだろう」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Ein Scan hat die vollständige Abwesenheit anormaler Prozess gezeigt. Es verbleiben nur Wunden ..." {n}Pasqal greift an die Spalte in seinem Respirator. Seine Stimme wird härter.{/n} "Die Leere wird durch einen reineren und frommeren Dienstalgorithmus ersetzt."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. A scan has shown a complete absence of anomalous processes. Only scars remain..." {n}Pasqal touches the cleft plate of his respirator. His voice becomes harsher.{/n} "The emptiness will be replaced with a purer and more pious algorithm of service."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Ein Scan hat die vollständige Abwesenheit anormaler Prozess gezeigt. Es verbleiben nur Wunden ..." {n}Pasqal greift an die Spalte in seinem Respirator. Seine Stimme wird härter.{/n} "Die Leere wird durch einen reineren und frommeren Dienstalgorithmus ersetzt."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cette affirmation est exacte. Une analyse a montré l'absence totale de procédés anormaux. Ne restent que des cicatrices... » {n}Pasqal touche la plaque fendue de son respirateur. Sa voix se fait plus dure.{/n} « Le vide sera remplacé par un algorithme de service plus pur et plus pieux. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. A scan has shown a complete absence of anomalous processes. Only scars remain..." {n}Pasqal touches the cleft plate of his respirator. His voice becomes harsher.{/n} "The emptiness will be replaced with a purer and more pious algorithm of service."

traits.locale_text: « Affirmatif. Une analyse a montré l'absence totale de procédés anormaux. Ne restent que des cicatrices... » {n}Pasqal touche la plaque fendue de son respirateur. Sa voix se fait plus dure.{/n} « Le vide sera remplacé par un algorithme de service plus pur et plus pieux. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "This statement is true. A scan has shown a complete absence of anomalous processes. Only scars remain..." {n}Pasqal touches the cleft plate of his respirator. His voice becomes harsher.{/n} "The emptiness will be replaced with a purer and more pious algorithm of service."

languages.text: "Bu önerme doğru. Yapılan tarama sonucunda anormal işlemlerin tamamen yok olduğu sonucuna varıldı. Yalnızca yara izleri kaldı." {n}Pasqal, solunum cihazındaki çatlak plakaya dokunuyor. Sesi sertleşiyor.{/n} "Bu boşluk, daha saf ve inançlı bir hizmet algoritmasıyla değiştirilecektir."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. A scan has shown a complete absence of anomalous processes. Only scars remain..." {n}Pasqal touches the cleft plate of his respirator. His voice becomes harsher.{/n} "The emptiness will be replaced with a purer and more pious algorithm of service."

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme doğru. Yapılan tarama sonucunda anormal işlemlerin tamamen yok olduğu sonucuna varıldı. Yalnızca yara izleri kaldı." {n}Pasqal solunum cihazındaki çatlak plakaya dokunuyor. Sesi sertleşiyor.{/n} "Bu boşluk, daha saf ve daha inançlı bir hizmet algoritmasıyla değiştirilecektir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
